description.lang: - S2 Security.- Not only a siren, but also can be used as a doorbell via setting.- Can be wireless controlled by more Button, up to 3.- Longer Button control distance, up to 120m.- Built-in multiple tones, up to 30.- Built-in multiple adjustable Light Effect.

Lifeline group.(1) Device Reset Locally Notification, issued when Factory Reset is performed.(2) Sound Switch Tone Play Report, issued when a tone has started playing.(3) Sound Switch Configuration Report, issued when volume or default tone has changed.(4) Notification Report (Type=0x0E; Event=0x01), issued when Chime starts playing tone. (5) Notification Report (Type=0x0E; Event=0x00), issued when Chime stops playing tone.(6) Notification Report (Type=0x07; Event=0x09), issued when Chime is tampered and moved.(7) Notification Report (Type=0x08; Event=0x0A), issued when Button is low battery.(8) Notification Report (Type=0x08; Event=0x00), issued when Button comes back to normal battery.(9) Configuration Report (Parameter=0x32), issued when Pairing Button Mode is triggered.(10) Configuration Report (Parameter=0x33), issued when Unpairing or Pairing Button Mode finishes.
Mirror of Endpoint 1, group 2. When Endpoint 1 starts playing tone or stops playing tone, Nodes associated are controlled and will receive aBasic Set CC.
Mirror of Endpoint 2, group 2. When Endpoint 2 starts playing tone or stops playing tone, Nodes associated are controlled and will receive aBasic Set CC.
Mirror of Endpoint 3, group 2. When Endpoint 3 starts playing tone or stops playing tone, Nodes associated are controlled and will receive aBasic Set CC.
Mirror of Endpoint 4, group 2. When Endpoint 4 starts playing tone or stops playing tone, Nodes associated are controlled and will receive aBasic Set CC.
Mirror of Endpoint 5, group 2. When Endpoint 5 starts playing tone or stops playing tone, Nodes associated are controlled and will receive aBasic Set CC.
Mirror of Endpoint 6, group 2. When Endpoint 6 starts playing tone or stops playing tone, Nodes associated are controlled and will receive aBasic Set CC.
Mirror of Endpoint 7, group 2. When Endpoint 7 starts playing tone or stops playing tone, Nodes associated are controlled and will receive aBasic Set CC.
Mirror of Endpoint 8, group 2. When Endpoint 8 starts playing tone or stops playing tone, Nodes associated are controlled and will receive aBasic Set CC.

name.lang: Configure the Light Effect and Tone Play Mode for Endpoint 1(Browse).

description.lang: Please refer to the Product Manual for more details.
Configure the Light Effect and Tone Play Mode for Endpoint 1(Browse).

name.lang: Configure #1 Light Effect.

description.lang: Please refer to the Product Manual for more details.

The Light Effect is displayed cyclically, and the maximum display duration is equal to the total duration of the tone playback. In other words, the Light Effect will be displayed in a loop until stop playing tone.

name.lang: Factory Reset or Initialization (Write Only)

description.lang: Parameter 51/52/53/54 will not restore the configuration settings to the default when Factory Reset or Initialization is performed.
Initialization: Initialize all configuration parameters to default values.
Factory Reset: Restore the product to factory settings and remove from the network.

Configure the Light Effect and Tone Effect for Endpoint 3(Doorbell 1).

name.lang: Configure how to send Basic Set to nodes in Group 2.

description.lang: Dont send Basic Set.
When Endpoint 1 starts playing tone, send Basic Set 0xFF. When Endpoint 1 stops playing tone, dont send Basic Set.
When Endpoint 1 starts playing tone, send Basic Set 0x00. When Endpoint 1 stops playing tone, dont send Basic Set.
When Endpoint 1 starts playing tone, send Basic Set 0xFF. When Endpoint 1 stops playing tone, send Basic Set 0x00.
When Endpoint 1 starts playing tone, send Basic Set 0x00. When Endpoint 1 stops playing tone, send Basic Set 0xFF.

Configure the Light Effect and Tone Effect for Endpoint 4(Doorbell 2).

name.lang: Tigger Unpairing Button Mode (Write Only)

description.lang: (1) Can trigger unpairing multiple Buttons at one time.(2) User does not need to do anything to Button.(3) Indicator Light will quickly flash white light 3 times when Unpairing Button Mode finishes.
Tigger Unpairing #1 Button Mode.
Tigger Unpairing #2 Button Mode.
Tigger Unpairing #2 and #1 Button Mode.
Tigger Unpairing #3 Button Mode.
Tigger Unpairing #3 and #1 Button Mode.
Tigger Unpairing #3 and #2 Button Mode.
Tigger Unpairing #3, #2 and #1 Button Mode.

name.lang: Tigger Pairing Button Mode (Write Only)

description.lang: (1) Can NOT trigger pairing multiple Buttons at one time.(2) Pairing time is up to 10 seconds. In this time period, user MUST manually click Ring Button 3 times quickly. Otherwise it cannot be paired successfully.(3) Each successful pairing will overwrite the previous paired Button which has the same Button Number.
Exit Pairing Button Mode.
Tigger Pairing #1 Button Mode.
Tigger Pairing #2 Button Mode.
Tigger Pairing #3 Button Mode.

name.lang: Configure the Light Effect and Tone Effect for Endpoint 5(Doorbell 3).

description.lang: Please refer to the Product Manual for more details.
Configure the Light Effect and Tone Effect for Endpoint 5(Doorbell 3).

name.lang: Report which Pairing Button Mode is triggered (Read Only)

description.lang: Once Pairing Button Mode is triggered, node will automatically send this configuration report via Lifeline to inform which Button is waiting for being paired.
There is no Pairing Button Mode being triggered.
Pairing #1 Button Mode is triggered.
Pairing #2 Button Mode is triggered.
Pairing #3 Button Mode is triggered.

name.lang: Report which Buttons had been paired (Read Only)

description.lang: Once Unpairing or Pairing Button Mode finishes, node will automatically send this configuration report via Lifeline to inform which Buttons had been paired. This parameter does not restore to the default value when Chime is removed from the network or reset the factory settings.
There is no paired Button.
#1 Button had been paired.
#2 Button had been paired.
#2 and #1 Button had been paired.
#3 Button had been paired.
#3 and #1 Button had been paired.
#3 and #2 Button had been paired.
#3, #2 and #1 Button had been paired.

name.lang: Get the information of #1 Button (Read Only)

description.lang: This parameter does not restore to the default value when Chime is removed from the network or reset the factory settings.
#1 Button is unpaired.
Information about #1 Button, including battery voltage (unit is mV) and software version.

name.lang: Get the information of #2 Button (Read Only)

description.lang: This parameter does not restore to the default value when Chime is removed from the network or reset the factory settings.
#2 Button is unpaired.
Information about #2 Button, including battery voltage (unit is mV) and software version.

name.lang: Get the information of #3 Button (Read Only)

description.lang: This parameter does not restore to the default value when Chime is removed from the network or reset the factory settings.
#3 Button is unpaired.
Information about #3 Button, including battery voltage (unit is mV) and software version.

description.lang: Disable
Enable
